title: Vantage Point CAM x264 ( Stuffies).mkv
description:
NOTES:
The is a re-encode of prevails xvid.....whcich for a cam wasn&#039;t too bad.
The audio was ok but very tiny and had some distortion.

WORK DONE by Stuffies:

Firstly i stripped the audio and filter it with a light hiss removal filter.....then i messed about with the
bass,treble and mid,and also lower the db&#039;s .......however please remember it&#039;s still cam audio whatever
i do to it.
The video i added more chroma,gamma,lum whilst lowering the rgb contrast to try and remove someone
of the white spots you get.Also added more normal contrast to make the black look black not grey.
